00012 #define MULADDC_INIT                            \
00013     __asm   mov     esi, s                      \
00014     __asm   mov     edi, d                      \
00015     __asm   mov     ecx, c                      \
00016     __asm   mov     ebx, b
00017 
00018 #define MULADDC_CORE                            \
00019     __asm   lodsd                               \
00020     __asm   mul     ebx                         \
00021     __asm   add     eax, ecx                    \
00022     __asm   adc     edx, 0                      \
00023     __asm   add     eax, [edi]                  \
00024     __asm   adc     edx, 0                      \
00025     __asm   mov     ecx, edx                    \
00026     __asm   stosd
00027 
00028 #define MULADDC_STOP                            \
00029     __asm   mov     c, ecx                      \
00030     __asm   mov     d, edi                      \
00031     __asm   mov     s, esi                      \

00312 #define MULADDC_INIT                            \
00313     asm( "movl   %0, %%a2       " :: "m" (s));  \
00314     asm( "movl   %0, %%a3       " :: "m" (d));  \
00315     asm( "movl   %0, %%d3       " :: "m" (c));  \
00316     asm( "movl   %0, %%d2       " :: "m" (b));  \
00317     asm( "moveq  #0, %d0        " );
00318 
00319 #define MULADDC_CORE                            \
00320     asm( "movel  %a2@+, %d1     " );            \
00321     asm( "mulul  %d2, %d4:%d1   " );            \
00322     asm( "addl   %d3, %d1       " );            \
00323     asm( "addxl  %d0, %d4       " );            \
00324     asm( "moveq  #0,  %d3       " );            \
00325     asm( "addl   %d1, %a3@+     " );            \
00326     asm( "addxl  %d4, %d3       " );
00327 
00328 #define MULADDC_STOP                            \
00329     asm( "movl   %%d3, %0       " :: "m" (c));  \
00330     asm( "movl   %%a3, %0       " :: "m" (d));  \
00331     asm( "movl   %%a2, %0       " :: "m" (s) :  \
00332     "d0", "d1", "d2", "d3", "d4", "a2", "a3" );

00378 
00379 #define MULADDC_INIT                    \
00380 {                                       \
00381     t_int s0, s1, b0, b1;               \
00382     t_int r0, r1, rx, ry;               \
00383     b0 = ( b << biH ) >> biH;           \
00384     b1 = ( b >> biH );
00385 
00386 #define MULADDC_CORE                    \
00387     s0 = ( *s << biH ) >> biH;          \
00388     s1 = ( *s >> biH ); s++;            \
00389     rx = s0 * b1; r0 = s0 * b0;         \
00390     ry = s1 * b0; r1 = s1 * b1;         \
00391     r1 += ( rx >> biH );                \
00392     r1 += ( ry >> biH );                \
00393     rx <<= biH; ry <<= biH;             \
00394     r0 += rx; r1 += (r0 < rx);          \
00395     r0 += ry; r1 += (r0 < ry);          \
00396     r0 +=  c; r1 += (r0 <  c);          \
00397     r0 += *d; r1 += (r0 < *d);          \
00398     c = r1; *(d++) = r0;
00399 
00400 #define MULADDC_STOP                    \
00401 }
